job_description:
Join us as an IT Intern to support daily IT operations. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Assisting with hardware/software troubleshooting, PC & printer setup, and user support.
2. Maintaining IT asset inventory and helping the team with routine tasks and small projects.
3. Executing test cases, reporting bugs, documenting results, and creating simple guides or SOPs.

This position is ideal for graduates who want exposure to IT support and basic system testing in manufacturing environment.
